702351f-a.text:
9922-9926 Fourth Ave., at the N.W. corner of 100th Street, showing(at
the corner) Hartmann's Hotel.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

702352f-a.text:
(1) 10009-10027 Fourth Ave., east side, between 101st and 100th Streets.  The buildings concerned are all frame houses.  The house in the foreground, now an inn, was once the residence of General Robert E. Lee, while a Colonel of Engineers at Fort Hamilton, before the Civil War.

June 9, 1932

P.L. Sperr

(2) The same, from a different angle.

May 10, 1929.

P.L. Sperr
